MAN.TITLE: pyrdown

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: Type of the filter used for convolution; only GAUSSIAN_5x5 is currently supported.

DESCRIPTION.P: pyrdownThe function pyrdown performs downsampling step of Gaussian pyramid decomposition. First it convolves source image with the specified filter and then downsamples the image by rejecting even rows and columns.
